languages.text: {n}Речь техножреца звучит отрывисто и резко.{/n} "Халатные решения губернатора Райкада Минорис привели к недопустимым последствиям. Потеряна связь со святилищем Адептус Механикус. Необходимо отправить войска в Благословенную Электродинамическую Обитель. В кратчайшие сроки. Восстановить связь с техножрецами и обеспечить безопасность святилища — первостепенная задача".

traits.locale_text: {n}Речь техножреца звучит отрывисто и резко.{/n} "Халатные решения губернатора Райкад Минорис привели к недопустимым последствиям. Потеряна связь со святилищем Адептус Механикус. Необходимо отправить войска в Благословенную Электродинамическую Обитель. В кратчайшие сроки. Восстановить связь с техножрецами и обеспечить безопасность святилища — первостепенная задача".

languages.text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Electro-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."
languages.original_text: {n}Речь техножреца звучит отрывисто и резко.{/n} "Халатные решения губернатора Райкада Минорис привели к недопустимым последствиям. Потеряна связь со святилищем Адептус Механикус. Необходимо отправить войска в Благословенную Электродинамическую Обитель. В кратчайшие сроки. Восстановить связь с техножрецами и обеспечить безопасность святилища — первостепенная задача".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be deployed to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium as soon as possible. Restoring communication with the Tech-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our priorities."

Restoring communication with the Tech-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our priorities."

Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Tech-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester sagt scharf und knapp:{/n} "Chaotische und fahrlässige Entscheidungen seitens des Gouverneurs von Rykad Minoris haben zu inakzeptablen Konsequenzen geführt. Die Kommunikation mit dem Sanctum des Adeptus Mechanicus ist unterbrochen. Es müssen unverzüglich Truppen zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium geschickt werden. Die Wiederherstellung der Kommunikation mit den Elektropriestern und die Gewährleistung der Sicherheit des Sanctums haben oberste Priorität."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Electro-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester sagt scharf und knapp:{/n} "Chaotische und fahrlässige Entscheidungen seitens des Gouverneurs von Rykad Minoris haben zu inakzeptablen Konsequenzen geführt. Die Kommunikation mit dem Sanctum des Adeptus Mechanicus ist unterbrochen. Es müssen unverzüglich Truppen zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium geschickt werden. Die Wiederherstellung der Kommunikation mit den Techpriestern und die Gewährleistung der Sicherheit des Sanctums haben oberste Priorität."

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre dit sur un ton sec et acerbe :{/n} « Les décisions hasardeuses et imprudentes du gouverneur de Rykad Minoris ont eu des conséquences inacceptables. La communication avec le sanctum de l'Adeptus Mechanicus a été interrompue. Des troupes doivent être envoyées au Cenobium électrodynamique sacré sans délai. Rétablir la communication avec les électro-prêtres et garantir la sécurité du sanctum sont nos priorités absolues. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Electro-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre dit sur un ton sec et acerbe :{/n} « Les décisions hasardeuses et imprudentes du gouverneur de Rykad Minoris ont eu des conséquences inacceptables. La communication avec le sanctum de l'Adeptus Mechanicus a été interrompue. Des troupes doivent être envoyées au Cenobium électrodynamique sacré sans délai. Rétablir la communication avec les technoprêtres et garantir la sécurité du sanctum sont nos priorités absolues. »

languages.text: {n}技术神甫尖锐而简短地回答道。{/n}“小莱卡德总督做出了一系列粗心大意的决定，导致了不可接受的后果。与机械修会圣所的联系已经中断，需要立刻向神圣电驱力修会派遣部队。我们的首要任务就是恢复与电僧之间的联系，确保圣所安全。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Electro-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司尖锐而简短地回答道。{/n}“小莱卡德总督做出了一系列粗心大意的决定，导致了不可接受的后果。与机械修会圣所的联系已经中断，需要立刻向神圣电驱力修会派遣部队。我们的首要任务就是恢复与技术祭司的联系，确保圣所安全。”

languages.text: {n}技術司祭はピシャリと素っ気なく言った。{/n}「ライカド・ミノリスの総督側の場当たりで軽率な決定が、許されない結果に繋がった。帝国技術局のサンクトゥムとの通信が失われたのだ。神聖なる電力連生体に遅れず軍隊を送られなければならない。エレクトロ・プリーストとの通信を回復して、サンクトゥムの安全を確保することが我々の最優先事項だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Electro-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭はピシャリと素っ気なく言った。{/n}「ライカド・ミノリスの総督側の場当たりで軽率な決定が、許されない結果に繋がった。帝国技術局のサンクトゥムとの通信が失われたのだ。神聖なる電力連生体に遅れず軍隊を送られなければならない。技術司祭との通信を回復して、サンクトゥムの安全を確保することが我々の最優先事項だ」

languages.text: {n}El Tecnosacerdote dice, brusca y secamente,{/n} «Las decisiones imprudentes y temerarias del gobernador de Rykad Minoris han tenido consecuencias inaceptables. Se ha perdido la comunicación con el sanctum del Adeptus Mechanicus. Las tropas deben ser enviadas al Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado sin demora. Restablecer la comunicación con los electrosacerdotes y garantizar la seguridad del sanctum son nuestras principales prioridades».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Electro-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Tecnosacerdote dice, brusca y secamente,{/n} «Las decisiones imprudentes y temerarias del gobernador de Rykad Minoris han tenido consecuencias inaceptables. Se ha perdido la comunicación con el sanctum del Adeptus Mechanicus. Las tropas deben ser enviadas al Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado sin demora. Restablecer la comunicación con los Tecnosacerdotes y garantizar la seguridad del sanctum son nuestras principales prioridades».

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in sözleri sert ve suçlayıcı.{/n} "Rykad Minoris valisinin gelişigüzel ve umursamaz kararları, kabul edilemez sonuçlar doğurdu. Adeptus Mechanicus kutağıyla iletişim bütünüyle kesildi. Vakit kaybetmeden Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'na birlik gönderilmeli. Elektro Rahiplerle iletişimi tesis etmek ve kutağın emniyetini sağlamak, önceliklerimizin başında."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says, sharply and curtly,{/n} "Haphazard and careless decisions on the part of the Rykad Minoris governor have led to unacceptable consequences. Communication with the Adeptus Mechanicus sanctum has been lost. Troops must be sent to the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium without delay. Restoring communication with the Electro-Priests and ensuring the sanctum's security are our top priorities."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in sözleri sert ve suçlayıcı.{/n} "Rykad Minoris valisinin gelişigüzel ve umursamaz kararları, kabul edilemez sonuçlar doğurdu. Adeptus Mechanicus kutağıyla iletişim bütünüyle kesildi. Vakit kaybetmeden Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'na birlik gönderilmeli. Elektro Rahiplerle iletişimi tesis etmek ve kutağın emniyetini sağlamak, önceliklerimizin başında."
